summary: The teenage son of a motel owner steals a black convertible to impress a mysterious beauty he has a crush on.
cast: Tobey Maguire|Amy Hathaway|Wilson Cruz|Christina Zilber|James Karen|Adam West|Benicio Del Toro|Steven Gilborn|J.P. Bumstead|Kenn Norman|Judson Mills|Susan Romick|Marc Robinson|Julie Rowen|Leslie Bartlett|Kristal Cawagas
title: Robo inocente
